question: List companies that have active technology partnerships and specify the technology focus areas involved.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Query the CompanyITPartnerDetail table to identify companies with active partnerships and their associated details such as DealValue and Start/End dates.","table":["CompanyITPartnerDetail"]},{"step":2,"task":"Join the results from the previous step with the CompanyInfo table to get the names and other relevant metadata of those companies.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyITPartnerDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Link the results to the CompanyFocusAreaDetail table to extract the technology focus areas related to each company and partner detail identified earlier.","table":["CompanyFocusAreaDetail","CompanyITPartnerDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Filter the combined results to only include active entries where partnerships are currently active and associated IT focus areas are defined.","table":["CompanyFocusAreaDetail","CompanyITPartnerDetail","CompanyInfo"]},{"step":5,"task":"Format the results into a user-friendly report displaying company names, partnership details, and their respective technology focus areas.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyITPartnerDetail","CompanyFocusAreaDetail"]}]}
